RENAME THE FILE TO BE Settings.xml INSTEAD OF new_Settings_(version).xml BEFORE USING! ALSO DON'T FORGET TO CHANGE THE TOKEN TO YOUR BOT'S TOKEN!
ALSO NOTE THAT THE VERSION NUMBER IN THE FILE NAME IS THE BOT VERSION WHERE THIS SETTINGS FILE WAS LAST UPDATED! IF THERE IS A SETTINGS FILE WITH A VERSION NUMBER HIGHER THAN THE ONE YOU HAVE THEN YOU SHOULD UPDATE TO THAT FILE! <-->
BOT SETTINGS: Token - Token for the bot that's running the program. NoGUI - If true, start the bot without the GUI. The GUI may take up more processing power. Use the `stop` command to stop the bot instead. GitHubDataRepository - Repository where the bot will pull images from. BotOwnerID: Bot Owner's ID (aka, the only person who can use 'update' and 'stop'). <-->
YOUR_BOT_TOKEN_HERE true https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Expugn/S-argo_Data_v2/master/ BOT_OWNER_DISCORD_ID_HERE
COMMAND SETTINGS: UseMention - Commands are called via '@Bot ' if true. CommandPrefix - If UseMention is false, commands are called via ''. DeleteUserMessage - If true, the bot deletes the message that the player used to call it. IgnoredChannels - Channels that you don't want the bot to work in. <-->
true $ false
SCOUT SETTINGS: DisableImages - If true, users cannot create images by adding an "i" after their scout type. SimpleMessage - If true, the EmbedMessage will not be used and the scout results will be shown via plain text. RarityStars - If true, stars that display the rarity will be added to the character/weapon images. ScoutMaster - The "Scout Master" that the bot should use. Put the file name without the extension here. Base Rates - Rates used for the summon simulator. By default, the rates are: - 69% for a Copper Character - 25% for a Silver Character - 4% for a Gold Character - 2% for a Platinum Character If no Platinum character exists in a banner, the 2% gets added to the Copper Character rates. RecordCrystal - Rates for how much record crystals the user will get when scouting from a record crystal banner. By default, the rates are: - 3% for 1 RC - 37% for 2 RC - 40% for 3 RC - 10% for 4 RC - 3.5% for 5 RC - 3.5% for 6 RC - 1% for 7 RC - 1% for 8 RC - 0.5% for 9 RC - 0.5% for 10 RC CirculatingRecordCrystal - Rates for how much record crystals the user will get back when record-crystal-scouting from a record crystal v3 banner. By default, the rates are: - 36% for 1 RC - 60% for 2 RC - 2.5% for 3 RC - 1.0% for 4 RC - 0.5% for 5 RC GoldBanners - These are the banners included in record crystal guaranteed scouts. GoldBannersv2 - These are the banners included in record crystal v2 guaranteed scouts. <-->
